title: Post-Fire Seedling Succession
text:
The final project of my BIO 359 Big Data in Ecology class, this HTML report built using RMarkdown analyses public data sourced from the Bonanza Creek LTER. I investigated post-fire seedling densities of three tree species in Alaska’s boreal forest following fire of different intensities.
View all project files on GitHub

title: Italian Agriculture Through the Ages
text:
The final project of my COMP/STAT 212 Intermediate Data Science class, this interactive blog post built using Quarto and Shiny analyses archeobotanical data from across Italy as well as modern-day agriculture production data. My partner Grace Bettenburg and I investigated spatial and temporal patterns of agriculture in Italy in order to explore how humans’ relationships to plants have changed over time and how these relationships are tied to location.
Read the blog post
View our code on Github
